content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions. However, I can provide you with some information that might help you decide.

Kotlin is gaining popularity in the mobile app development industry due to its modern features, ease of use, and compatibility with Java. Many developers are using Kotlin to develop Android apps, and some companies are even making it their primary language for app development.

Learning Kotlin can give you an advantage in the job market as it is a language that is in high demand. Moreover, with its concise syntax, powerful tooling, and functional programming capabilities, Kotlin can help you write more efficient code, which can ultimately lead to faster development and fewer errors.

In summary, if you are interested in mobile app development, learning Kotlin can certainly be advantageous and open up new opportunities in the industry.
